Though its durability is far inferior to that of the large Tearstone buildings or the slag cement houses in the [[Court of Fontaine]], it is easy to maintain and build, and does not require specialists for repairs.<br>It is said that during the construction of the tunnel on the [[Clementine Line]], engineers had to stay on-site to be ready to fix malfunctioning clockwork meka at any time, so they built houses patterned after the local dwellings near the tunnel. '''Automnequi's Watch''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for Automnequi's Watch is obtainable from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.

|time = 14h
